patterns: What kinds of services do you offer
What is this bussiness all about
responses: We offer tech solution to improve businesses to work healthy.
Our services include ERP, IOT, Technology Consulting, bussiness Intelligence, software testing, mobile app development, Data Visualization, Product Engineering
Our top bussiness are Enterprise Resource Planning(ERPs), Customer relationship management(CRMs) and Mobile Sales Force Automation(SFAs).

patterns: What services do you offer mostly
responses: Our common services are ERP, technology consulting, data warehousing, custom software development and IOT
We have different technologies that is for backend, frontend, mobile, bussiness analytics, cloud warehousing, and IOT
We serve industries such as fitness, fintech, education, healthcare, energy, manufacturing, travel, advertising, retail, entertainment, supply chain and life services
Enterprise resource planing is a platform that integrates and manages the essential parts of a business(finance, HR, supply chain, etc.).
Enterprise resource planing is a software that helps organisations automate and manage the core business processesfinance, HR, supply chain, etc.).
Customer relationship management (CRM) is the principles, practices, and guidelines that an organization follows when interacting with its customers
Customer relationship management (CRM) is a strategy to build stronger customer relationships.

patterns: What is Mobile Sales Force Automation
responses: Mobile Sales Force Automation(SFA) is a component of CRM systems focused on automating sales activities .

patterns: What are some of the backend technologies
responses: Backend technology is building and managing the server-side elements including logic data-storage, in web applications.Backend tech we use are NodeJS, python, javascript, java, django, .NET

patterns: What are some of the BI And Analytics technologies
responses: BI And Analytics is technology driven data analysis for informed decisions. BI And Analytics technologies include PowerBI, Tableau, Big Data, pentaho, predictive analysis solutions

patterns: What are some of the Cloud technologies
responses: Cloud computing is the availlablity of computing resources eg storage and infrastructure as services on the internet. Platforms that offer include Microsoft Azure, AWS and salesforce.

patterns: What are some of the frontend technologies
responses: Frontend also known as client side is creating user-friendly web elements. Frontend technologies include Javascript, ReactJS, html, css, vueJS.

patterns: What are some of the mobile technologies
responses: Mobile technologies we use to create mobile apps are flutter, React Native, kotlin, swift

patterns: What are some of the internet of things
responses: Internet of things refers to a network of interconnected devices with sensors and internet connectivity12. These devices can transfer data without human intervention, enhancing various aspects of life

patterns: What are some of the ai
responses: AI is a computer system that is able to perform tasks that historically require human intelligence. We offer ai technology such as Machine learning, deep learning, neural networking.

patterns: Why do I need business inteligence
responses: Business Intelligence (BI) helps decision-making, cost-cutting, and spotting inefficiencies in businesses.

patterns: Why do I need Technology Consulting
responses: We offer technology consultation for what technology is better given your business or problem you wnt to solve.

patterns: What software solutions do you provide for your business
responses: We offer custom software solutions for your business
Data visualization is graphical representation of data and helps see patterns in data and also prediction
A data warehouse is a system used for reporting and data analysis. Data warehousing helps data analytics on large volumes of data that standard databases can't handle efficiently.
Software testing is the process of evaluating and verifying that a software product or application performs as intended.
We accept VISA, Mastercard and Paypal
We accept most major credit cards, and Paypal

responses: Depends on the work load.
